sentences.en: A young virtuoso cornet player named Louis Armstrong was discovered in New Orleans by King Oliver.
sentences.cn: 在新奥尔良一位名为路易?阿姆斯特朗的年轻小号手被金?奥列佛发现.

sentences.en: Are you the widow of the killed Cornet Melekhov?
sentences.cn: 你是被杀的米列霍夫少尉的遗孀 吗 ?

sentences.en: He played the cornet in the school band.
sentences.cn: 他在学校乐队吹奏短号.

sentences.en: In 1915, he got first cornet and was soon known around New Orleans as formidable.
sentences.cn: 1915年, 他担任首席短号手,很快就享誉新奥尔良,被人们认为无人可比.

sentences.en: Louis was still too young to live on playing his cornet.
sentences.cn: 他依然太小,不能以演奏小号为生.

sentences.en: She caught sight of him as he turnedthe cornet.
The bus driver set her down at the cornet.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车司机在转弯处停下来让她下车.

sentences.en: The cornet is marking the time.
The drunken little costdrawer and his brother, the cornet player.
sentences.cn: 酗酒的小成本会计师和他那吹短号的兄弟.

sentences.en: With trumpets and sound cornet make a joyful noise before the Lord, the King.
sentences.cn: 6用号和角声,在大君王耶和华面前欢呼!

sentences.en: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the Lord, the King.
sentences.cn: 诗98:6用号和角声 、 在大君王耶和华面前欢呼.

trans.tran_cn: 短号，（盛冰激凌的）圆锥形蛋卷，吹短号者
trans.tran_en: a musical instrument like a small  trumpet
